scripts.dev: bun run es:start && PORT=8083 bunx tsx watch src/server.ts
scripts.ufa:dev: NODE_ENV=development bun run es:start && PORT=8083 bunx tsx watch src/server.ts
scripts.dev:server-only: SKIP_ES_WAIT=true PORT=8083 bunx tsx watch src/server.ts
scripts.es:start: docker compose up -d && ./scripts/es-wait.sh && bun run es:init-indices
scripts.es:stop: docker compose down || echo 'Note: docker compose down failed (may not be running)'
scripts.es:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d && ./scripts/es-wait.sh && bun run es:init-indices
